local_intent: Execute a standard top grasp on the red object after detection and alignment, then verify grasp security.
assumptions: Red object is reachable and visible.
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence around the Pick phase: retry DetectObject, align with tight tolerance, open gripper, Pick with grasp_key std_top and timeout 2000, then verify via ObjectInGripper and IsGraspStable.
